pullrequest.title: Slimmed down the Plugin pull request (no more template specializations)

content.raw: I forgot this variable was in function scope, which changes [the meaning of `static`](https://stackoverflow.com/a/178259). But yeah, as long as there aren't important side effects caused by construction and destruction, `const` should be preferred over `static`, and I believe the compiler can optimize away the cost of repeated construction (as long as it can detect that there are no side effects, which should be the case for `std::string`).
